# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Paramedic
The Paramedic is responsible for providing medical support to the crew. They can achieve this by using medical tools and equipment. Paramedics usually respond to emergencies on scene, rather than in the Medbay.
## Do - Respond to emergencies on scene. - Bring the injured to Medbay if on-site treatment is not possible. - Stay stocked with medicines, equipment and other supplies.
## Don't - Ignore crew members in need of medical attention.
